trans-unit.source: The workstation on which <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is installed must be associated with a node. You can:

seg-source.mrk: The workstation on which <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is installed must be associated with a node.

target.mrk: Le poste de travail sur lequel <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est installé doit être associé à un nœud.

trans-unit.source: Define an automatic allocation policy for agents on the nodes associated with a tenant. For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Create_a_Tenant.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create a Tenant.</MadCap:xref>

seg-source.mrk: Define an automatic allocation policy for agents on the nodes associated with a tenant.
For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Create_a_Tenant.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create a Tenant.</MadCap:xref>

target.mrk: Définir une stratégie d’allocation automatique pour les agents sur les nœuds associés à une entité.
Pour plus d’informations, consulter <MadCap:xref href="Create_a_Tenant.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create a Tenant.</MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Associate an agent with a node while creating the agent on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Create_Agents_Manually.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create [%=ALN.aln%] Agents Manually</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Associate an agent with a node while creating the agent on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Create_Agents_Manually.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create [%=ALN.aln%] Agents Manually</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Associer un agent à un nœud lors de la création de l'agent sur la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. Pour plus d'informations, consulter <MadCap:xref href="Create_Agents_Manually.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Create [%=ALN.aln%] Agents Manually</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specify the node to associate with the agent, using the accessinfo. For more details on the CfgServerHost, see <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Agent_to_Server_Access.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configure Advanced Agent to Server Access</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Specify the node to associate with the agent, using the accessinfo.

For more details on the CfgServerHost, see <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Agent_to_Server_Access.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configure Advanced Agent to Server Access</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Spécifier le nœud à associer à l’agent, à l’aide de l'accessinfo.

Pour plus de détails sur le CfgServerHost, consulter <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Agent_to_Server_Access.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configure Advanced Agent to Server Access</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the master server is unavailable for any reason, the agents continue to be protected and data can be restored. The master server is not required for backup or restore.

seg-source.mrk: If the master server is unavailable for any reason, the agents continue to be protected and data can be restored.
The master server is not required for backup or restore.

target.mrk: Si le serveur master est indisponible pour une raison quelconque, les agents continuent d'être protégés et les données peuvent être restaurées.
Le serveur master n'est pas nécessaire pour la sauvegarde ou la restauration.

trans-unit.source: If a node is offline, agents associated with that node cannot be backed up or restored.

seg-source.mrk: If a node is offline, agents associated with that node cannot be backed up or restored.

target.mrk: Si un nœud est hors ligne, les agents associés à ce nœud ne peuvent pas être sauvegardés ou restaurés.
